name: membranophone
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any musical instrument in which sound is produced mainly by the vibration (= continuous quick movement) of a stretched membrane (= a very thin piece of skin or material): The drum is a membranophone. See also
aerophone
chordophone
electrophone
idiophone
More examplesFewer examplesA kazoo is a member of the membranophone classification of musical instruments.Here, a water bottle and a paper tube make a membranophone.This membranophone, translated as 'timbrel' and 'tabret,' was not permitted in the Temple.
